abstract: UnitedHealth Group, the health insurer, said on Wednesday that it agreed to pay $895 million to settle a class-action lawsuit with the California Public Employees Retirement System, which is known as Calpers, and Alaska Plumbing and Pipefitting Industry Pension Trust.
lead_paragraph: UnitedHealth Group, the health insurer, said on Wednesday that it agreed to pay $895 million to settle a class-action lawsuit with the California Public Employees Retirement System, which is known as Calpers, and Alaska Plumbing and Pipefitting Industry Pension Trust.
